title: Tachachit Roman Site
description: A small fortified hilltop settlement located on private land in the modern Algerian village of "Cr√®te Rouge" at Tachachit, which is approximately 8km north of El Adjiba. Noted already by Gsell for AAA, a 2012 cultural inventory notes visible remnants of walls, roof tiles, drainage conduit, a cistern, and a polychrome opus-tesselatum mosaic.

properties.description: Imagery location after description in Boutarene 2017.
